titleStmt.title: A perfect narrative of the phanatick wonders seen in the west of England. With a true relation of the particulars thereof: sent in a letter to a worthy gentleman, belonging to an alderman of the City of London. Attested under the hands of John Shipman, minister. Thomas Watkins, Church-warden. John Betterton, constable. Francis Cripps, and William Chaundler
titleStmt.author: Brown, G., of Fairford.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
